channel.title: How do I get npcs to announce that im online?
channel.description: Title says it all but can someone make me a code that makes 2 guardians on both sides of bank steps that says im online and offline?? plz it would be greatly aprreciated also tell me where to put it...

item.title: How do I get npcs to announce that im online?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

[quote=“daftcat, post:5, topic:68148”]can somebody help me with my error tried a tut and i screwed up trying to delete wat i tired

NPCHandler.java:657: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^[/quote]

Some time hapens when u delete something extra that u shouldent have or if u add something in the wrong place.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get npcs to announce that im online?

item.title: How do I get npcs to announce that im online?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Ok…Here ya have it… The steps!

  1. Open you’re Npc.Handler

  2. Search for ‘moo’

  3. Search for the gaurds

  4. Edit it to you’re name

  5. Heres the code

codenpcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to xlinescape owner is bluurr ";
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to xlinescapeowner is bluurr ";
}
}
}[/code]

  1. Save it

  2. Compile it

  3. You’re done

Recconmandations: I reccomend this compiler (Version V1.2) By Mod Taharok’s compiler

:: ::
:: All of the following code is © Copywrited 2006-2007, ::
:: Grene Penguin Entertainment. ::
:: ::

@echo off
cls
:menu
title Runserver + Compiler version 1.4
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%=KR goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
goto checkjavac
:compile2
if exist src (goto compile5) else (goto compile3)
:compile3
if exist *.java (goto compile4) else (goto compileerror)
:compile4
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compile5
%javac% -cp . .\src*.java
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
goto checkjava
:run2
set runjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto run3
:run3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto run6) else (goto run4)
:run4
if exist .\server.class (goto run5) else (goto servererror)
:run5
%runjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:run6
set runjava=
set runjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%runjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)

if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7)

item.title: How do I get npcs to announce that im online?
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

or go to npchandler.java and search for “moo” and find one that you want to change
example…i went to npchandler.java and searched moo… i want santa to say im online,
so i switch were it says “GET YOUR HOLIDAY STUFF HERE!” to " YOURNAME IS ONLINE!"
